| \_utilities\s

• \rgroupBy\s

```
function indicator( v ) {
    if ( v[ 0 ] === 'b' ) {
        return 'b';
    }
    return 'other';
};
var collection = [ 'beep', 'boop', 'foo', 'bar' ];
var out = groupBy( collection, indicator )
```


---

• \rpluck\s

```
var arr = [
    { 'a': 1, 'b': 2 },
    { 'a': 0.5, 'b': 3 }
];
var out = pluck( arr, 'a' )
```

| What is a REPL?
\s

--

• interactive programming environment

--

• individual user inputs (e.g., single expressions)

--

• evaluates those inputs

--

• returns the result

--

\s
Accordingly, an entered program is executed piecewise and sequentially.
